archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.2.5f: f) review and test business continuity plans and arrangements (including related security controls) on a regular basis (e.g. as part of a business continuity exercise)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
